title: Two Bedroom One Bath Coming Available Soon! Apply Now!
posting_body: Welcome to Terra Vista at the Park
Terra Vista at the Park offers comfortable apartment living brimming with amenities at an unbeatable Littleton location.
These Littleton apartments for rent are conveniently located with easy accessibility to downtown Littleton, the Littleton light rail stop, Santa Fe Drive, and an abundance of outdoor activities.
Make yourself at home with our outdoor swimming pool, clubhouse with WiFi, and fitness room for your enjoyment.
Our apartments in Littleton include washer and dryer in the home, a balcony or patio, a fireplace, and loads of closet space to fit your lifestyle.
Call us today to schedule your tour and make Terra Vista at the Park your next home.
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 672 Sq.
- Renovated interiors including new appliances, counter tops, cabinets, and wood flooring in the kitchen, bathrooms, and entry
- Additional storage off of the large patio/balcony
- Wood burning fireplaces in all homes
- Large bedrooms with high speed internet access
- Washer and dryer included in all floor plans
- Less than a 5 minute drive to the Downtown Littleton Light Rail Station
- Conveniently located near Littleton Golf and Tennis Club, Bowles Grove Park, and Mary Carter Greenway Trail
- Minutes from Aspen Grove shopping center
